title.value: Link list of the images for cloning (FTP Server)

body.value:
In 2015 there were these Labdoo images available on our FTP-Server http://ftp.labdoo.org/download/images/:
Lubuntu 12.04 LTS
nonPAE32_12_04_LTS (Lubuntu 12.04 LTS for nonPAE CPU)
PAE32_12_04_LTS (Lubuntu 12.04 LTS for 32 Bit CPU): this image is not available any-more, support cancelled
PAE64_12_04_LTS (Lubuntu 12.04 LTS for 64 Bit CPU)
Lubuntu 14.04 LTS (empfohlen)
nonPAE32_14_04_LTS (Lubuntu 14.04. LTS for nonPAE 32 CPU)
PAE32_14_04_LTS (Lubuntu 14.04 LTS for 32 Bit CPU)
PAE64_14_04_LTS (Lubuntu 14.04 LTS for 64 Bit CPU)
12.04 or 14.04 define the release date of the Lubuntu release, e.g. 12.04 = April 2012 and 14.04 = April 2014. LTS (Long Term Support) releases will be supported and updated for 5 years, counted from this release date. The next LTS release will be relased in April 2016 (16.04 LTS).
